org.ietf.nea.pb.serialize.writer.bytebuffer

Class PbMessageRemediationParameterStringValueWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pb.serialize.writer.bytebuffer.PbMessageRemediationParameterStringValueWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TnccsWriter<PbMessageValueRemediationParameterString>, Writer<PbMessageValueRemediationParameterString,ByteBuffer>

     class PbMessageRemediationParameterStringValueWriter
extends Object
implements TnccsWriter<PbMessageValueRemediationParameterString>
    Writer to serialize a TNCCS string remediation parameter compliant to RFC 5793 from a Java object to a buffer of bytes.
